channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Storage Ceph
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Storage Ceph

item.title: CVE-2023-46159|2024-02-02T02:28:51.876Z -- ibm -- storage%20ceph
item.description: IBM Storage Ceph 5.3z1, 5.3z5, and 6.1z1 could allow an authenticated user on the network to cause a denial of service from RGW. IBM X-Force ID: 268906.
